snippet: Make the Road New York, which is challenging the Police Department’s stop-and-frisk practice, has had success marching and lobbying for low-income and immigrant residents.
lead_paragraph: Make the Road New York, which is challenging the Police Department’s stop-and-frisk practice, has had success marching and lobbying for low-income and immigrant residents.

headline.main: In This Case, a Protest With Focus
headline.seo: Taking the Fight Against Stop-and-Frisk Tactic to City Hall
